ratings.comment: I thought I was going to hate Comm B because I hate writing but I was actually entertained every section. (Also the day did the lecture was the best one of the semester). She gives clear instructions and, I think, helped my writing a lot. She also does online paper submission so that's awesome. Overall, she's a great teacher and really helpful.

greek myth isn't the most exciting thing in the world, but Amanda sure made it seem like it was. She's high energy, super smart, and really funny. She always comes to class with a pretty smile. recommend to any UW student.
If Amanda was the teacher for every humanities course, I would drop my science major and not care if i was poor.

This is the best teacher I've had at Wisconsin. Period. I learned a lot and was extremely entertained the whole time. She's super helpful, really nice, and hilarious. Even her quizzes are funny. Because of her I'm taking more Classics courses.

She's a fantastic TA. She makes any reading interesting, she gives the occasional pop quiz (they are extremely easy if you've read/skimmed), and she's hilarious. I've even gone out of my way to make sure I have her this semester again. Highly recommend her.

Awesome TA, really funny in a sarcastic way. Very nice and helpful if you talk to her. A lot of just her reviewing readings, not much discussion... Helpful in understanding readings, though. Should go to class, she gives pop quizzes (easy). Use sparknotes, too, it helps a lot. Definitely recommend her!
Take this TA if you can!!!
Really fun. One of the best classes I've ever had. And.... she's really hot.
